TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ActiveDirectoryAuditRule extends System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectAuditRule

summary.span: 用于在系统访问控制列表 (SACL) 中设置访问控制项 (ACE)。

span.span: The is used to set an access control entry (ACE) on a system access control list (SACL).

summary.span: 包含受信者，表示为 对象。

span.span: The contains the trustee, which is represented as an object.

summary.span: 它还包含关于访问控制类型、访问掩码及其他属性（如继承标志）的信息。

span.span: It also contains information about the access control type, access mask, and other properties such as inheritance flags.

summary.span: 此规则在 对象上设置。

span.span: This rule is set on an object.

summary.span: 在 提交至目录存储区之后，它将根据在 上设置的规则修改安全说明符对象。

span.span: After the is committed to the directory store, it will modify the security descriptor object according to the rules that are set on .

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

param.name: identity
param.span: 指定一个解析为安全标识符 (SID) 的 对象，如 NTAccount 对象。

span.span: Specifies an object, such as an NTAccount object, that resolves to a security identifier (SID).

param.name: adRights
param.span: 指定一个 对象，它用于定义所有可以在目录对象上设置的权限（在 枚举中定义）。

span.span: Specifies an object, which is used to define all the rights that can be set on a directory object, as defined in the enumeration.

param.name: auditFlags
param.span: 指定一个 对象，此对象包含一个或多个要添加到此 的审核标志的组合。

span.span: Specifies an object, which contains the combination of one or more audit flags to add to this .

param.span: 允许使用的标志是 和 。

span.span: The allowable flags are and .

param.span: 此参数不能为零。

span.span: This parameter may not be zero.

summary.span: 使用指定的标识、权限和标志来初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified identity, rights, and flags.
